name: Tooth Fish
description:
Hunt spooky mutated fish underwater. Made for 7DFPS 2022 by

Harry - https://mastodon.gamedev.place/@GeneralBug
Emma - https://twitter.com/candii_limes

Still left to do:

 - Sound
 - More big fish
 - Little fish
 - Bug fixing (the invisible wall collisions are a bit patchy, there probably still lots of places you can get stuck
